data.message: So gifted... Yet the gift is squandered here. Still talking about sexual abuse and torturing women? How about instead of putting out nicely arranged, nonsensical, empty lyrics you go to see a very reputable therapist.

replies.message: How about you just don't listen to Eminem
He's just warning you before he does it you your woman 😉
Haha I love all the butthurt. Keep it up angry little boys!
Butthurt is the one who takes the time to listen to someone who has always used controversial lyrics and you expecting not to hear them? Fucking idiot

I see a question mark. Clearly you are confused on the definition of butthurt. Imagine that feeling your stepdad provided you on many a night but translated into Internet rage from >17 year old boys who were in diapers when Eminem came out with his first hits. The only idiots are those who think he should be limiting himself to the sort of lyrics he played out a millennia ago. Eminem should mature and so should you losers.😂✌️
Ok troll go spew your idiocy elsewhere...don't like it don't listen
Yeah, I'm the troll. Yet you're only capable of communicating through insults and profanity with no logic or reasoning. You sound just like Eminem on this garbage new song 😂
